text: @Eatala_Rajender @TelanganaHealth @TelanganaCMO We are waiting for covid19 report from monday morning, without report even gandhi  hospital is not ready admit.. Maa akka bava are in critical condition😔 in railway lallaguda hospital.. P. Rajkumar and rajini bed no 3. Plz sir support us No private hospital has beds to accept 🙏
